name: Double Cannon
description:
Dodge obstacles and break your way through in this simple game

Unlock PowerUps which will allow you to go further beyond

Controls:

PC => Horizontal Axis (A/D, Left/Right)

Phone => Slide Across screen Width. The closer to the edges you are, the faster you move

Notes: 

PC versión recommended

Set Sensibility in Options for optimal experience

This game was made for GE Jam #3
